Thank you for helping us find each other!", date: "Married on February 2024", image: 'img1' }, { id: 2, name: "Anjali & Rohit", message: "Finding my soulmate was never this easy. We instantly connected and are now happily married!", date: "Married on January 2023", image: 'img2' }, { id: 3, name: "Sneha & Arjun", message: "Thanks to this platform, we found love and happiness. Forever grateful!", date: "Married on June 2022", image: 'img3' } ]; return (
